mapper.select:
SELECT SIZE_COND_CD , SIZE_COND_NM , WP_LEFT_COND , WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , WP_RIGHT_COND , WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PITCH_LEFT_COND , PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PITCH_RIGHT_COND , PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_WING_LEFT_COND , PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_WING_RIGHT_COND , PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_COND , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_COND , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , FILM_COND , FILM_ALWNCE_PLUS , FILM_ALWNCE_MINUS , METAL_DEPTH_COND , METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_PLUS , METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_MINUS , METAL_THICKNESS_COND , METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_PLUS , METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_MINUS , TH_CENTER_COND , TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , TH_EDGE_COND , TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_MINUS , ISNULL(GAP_OF_LAYER_COND, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_COND , ISNULL(GAP_OF_LAYER_PLUS, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_PLUS , ISNULL(GAP_OF_LAYER_MINUS, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_MINUS , BURR_COND , BURR_ALWNCE_PLUS , BURR_ALWNCE_MINUS , WP_CENTER_COND , WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_COND , PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , WP_DEVIATION_COND , WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_MINUS , X1_X2_COND , X1_X2_COND_PLUS , X1_X2_COND_MINUS , TH_EDGE_RIGHT_COND , TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , BENDING_COND , BENDING_ALWNCE_PLUS , BENDING_ALWNCE_MINUS , USE_YN_CD , REG_ID , REG_DATE , UPD_ID , UPD_DATE FROM TB_BOM_SIZE_COND_ADM WHERE 1=1
AND USE_YN_CD = '001'

SELECT SIZE_COND_CD , SIZE_COND_NM , WP_LEFT_COND , WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , WP_RIGHT_COND , WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PITCH_LEFT_COND , PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PITCH_RIGHT_COND , PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_WING_LEFT_COND , PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_WING_RIGHT_COND , PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_COND , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_COND , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , FILM_COND , FILM_ALWNCE_PLUS , FILM_ALWNCE_MINUS , METAL_DEPTH_COND , METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_PLUS , METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_MINUS , METAL_THICKNESS_COND , METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_PLUS , METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_MINUS , TH_CENTER_COND , TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , TH_EDGE_COND , TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_MINUS , BURR_COND , BURR_ALWNCE_PLUS , BURR_ALWNCE_MINUS , GAP_OF_LAYER_COND , GAP_OF_LAYER_PLUS , GAP_OF_LAYER_MINUS , USE_YN_CD , WP_CENTER_COND , WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_COND , PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , WP_DEVIATION_COND , WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_MINUS , X1_X2_COND , X1_X2_COND_PLUS , X1_X2_COND_MINUS , TH_EDGE_RIGHT_COND , TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , BENDING_COND , BENDING_ALWNCE_PLUS , BENDING_ALWNCE_MINUS , REG_ID , REG_DATE , UPD_ID , UPD_DATE FROM TB_BOM_SIZE_COND_ADM WHERE SIZE_COND_CD = #{sizeCondCd}
SELECT ISNULL(RIGHT('000' + CAST(MAX(SUBSTRING(SIZE_COND_CD,1,3))+1 AS NVARCHAR),3), '001') FROM TB_BOM_SIZE_COND_ADM

SELECT * FROM TB_BOM_SIZE_COND_SIX_FLOOR_ADM WHERE 1=1
AND USE_YN_CD = '001'
SELECT ISNULL(RIGHT('000' + CAST(MAX(SUBSTRING(SIZE_COND_CD,1,3))+1 AS NVARCHAR),3), '001') FROM TB_BOM_SIZE_COND_SIX_FLOOR_ADM
